Method Detail

synthesize

public javax.sound.sampled.AudioInputStream synthesize(Voice voice,
                                                       javax.sound.sampled.AudioFileFormat aft,
                                                       org.w3c.dom.Element domElement)
                                                throws java.lang.Exception
Handle a request for synthesis of vocalization

Parameters:
voice - the selected voice
aft - AudioFileFormat of the output AudioInputStream
domElement - target xml element ('vocalization' element)
Returns:
AudioInputStream of requested vocalization it returns null if the voice doesn't support synthesis of vocalizations
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if domElement contains 'variant' attribute value is greater than available number of vocalizations
java.lang.Exception

listAvailableVocalizations

public java.lang.String[] listAvailableVocalizations()
List the possible vocalization names that are available for the given voice. These values can be used in the "name" attribute of the vocalization tag.

Returns:
an array of Strings, each string containing one unique vocalization name.
